price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߘߏ߫ ߘߊߥߎ߲߫ ߠߴߏ߬ ߟߋ ߘߐ߫ ߞߵߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߞߣߐ ߟߎ߬ ߟߝߴߊ߬ ߟߊ߫
arabic: فَإِنَّهُمۡ لَأٓكِلُونَ مِنۡهَا فَمَالِـُٔونَ مِنۡهَا ٱلۡبُطُونَ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: fa-innahum laākilūna min'hā famāliūna min'hā al-buṭūna
